title: [Vornavis Caravansary Pawnshop]
description: Canvas curtains on two windows have been pulled back to allow light into the room, supplemented by rogue beams of light peeking through tears in the tarpaulin that serves as a roof.  A rusty wire supports a small sign hanging from the center support post.

Four oil lanterns hang from the plank walls, their repeated use leaving long, blackened stains on the tarpaulin roof overhead.  A rusty wire supports a small sign hanging from the center support post.
